text: Egha me Filistiabar gumazir dapanibar diazɨ me izezɨ, me kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “E uari, ia Israelian Godɨn Boksiam amadaghtɨma, a ua uan danganimra mangɨ. A e ko en adaraziv soghtɨ e arighireghan kogham.” Dughiar kamɨn, God mɨzazim me gasima, men avɨrim ariaghire. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, me bar moghɨra puvɨra atiati.
